alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 03 at 2:51PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Collier County through 330 PM EDT... At 249 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms over portions of northwest Collier county, or near Golden Gate Estates, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Naples, Golden Gate Estates, Ave Maria, Naples Park, Belle Meade, Orangetree, Naples Manor, Golden Gate, East Naples, Lely Resort, Big Corkscrew Island, West Toll Gate On Alligator Alley, Vineyards, North Naples, Pelican Bay, Corkscrew Swamp Sanctuary, Lely, South Blocks Golde, Picayune Strand State Forest and Intersection I-75 And Everglades Blvd. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County
